DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate efficacy trans-cranial magnetic stimulation treat attention deficit disorder adult .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Evaluate Efficacy HLPFC Coil Deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation System Treating Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) Adults
